== Main Inclusion Report for multipath-tools ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/m/multipath-tools, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'' Cluster support
# ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** Daemon running as root, only interacts with root.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** No showstopper Debian bugs, important one has been fixed in Ubuntu.
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Active upstream.
** No upstream bug tracker.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
